title: Rustic Betsy Ross 1776 Distressed American Flag Car Truck Flag with Window Clip On Pole Holder
features: MAKE A STATEMENT: What did one flag say to the other flag? Nothing, it just waved! Let your fan flag fly with our durable double-stitched single sided flag. Ideal for mounting from your car window to add a personalized touch to your ride.

QUALITY CONSTRUCTION: Our flag and pole set features a durable plastic left-mounting pole, approximately 19" (48 cm) in length. The colorful fabric flag showcases the design shown, and is printed with UV and water resistant ink to resist fading. Flag measures approximately 14" (36cm) x 11" (28cm).

MANY USES: College alumni, Potter crests, sports teams? We have them all. Our eye-catching flags are perfect for a variety of uses. Celebrate your fandom, favorite team, themed party, or special event.
All creative internal designs apply. In other words unlicensed.
description: What did one flag say to the other flag? Nothing, it just waved! Please wave a warm welcome to the car flag from Graphics and More, the perfect car accessory to make your vehicle feel more personalized to your taste! The pole is made of a durable plastic and measures approximately 19" (48cm) in length. Additionally, the fabric flag measures approximately 14" (36cm) x 11" (28cm), and it features a beautifully-transferred image of your choosing. The image is on one side of the flag, and will only look correct on the side of the vehicle listed. So what are you waiting for? Purchase a Graphics and More car flag, and ride in style today!

The Betsy Ross USA flag is an early design of the flag of the United States which was in use as early as 1776 or 1777. It has thirteen 5-pointed stars arranged in a circle and 13 alternating red-and-white stripes to represent the unity of the Thirteen Colonies. This historic U.S. flag design is a popular symbol of American patriotism.
